positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: Lead development of customer-facing web applications serving 100k+ users. Architected microservices migration reducing deployment times by 60%.
highlights: Led a team of 4 engineers on the platform redesign project
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing release cycles from weeks to days
Optimized database queries improving API response times by 40%

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description: Built and maintained full-stack features for a B2B SaaS product. Worked closely with product and design teams in a fast-paced environment.
highlights: Developed real-time notification system using WebSockets
Built reusable component library adopted across 3 product teams
Wrote comprehensive test suites achieving 85% code coverage

positions.title: Junior Developer
positions.description: Developed responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Gained strong fundamentals in frontend and backend development.
highlights: Delivered 15+ client projects on time and within budget
Introduced automated testing practices to the team
Mentored 2 interns through their onboarding process
